title: ZKP Gate Policy
description: Defines the Zero-Knowledge Proof requirements for accessing or modifying a directory node.

gate_id.description: Unique identifier for this gate instance.

allowed_roles.description: List of RBAC roles permitted to interact with this node.

required_proofs.description: List of ZKP circuits that must be satisfied.

circuit_id.description: Hash of the verifying key for the circuit.

parameters.description: Public inputs required for the proof.

enforcement_level.description: Behavior when proof fails: block (strict), log (audit), or allow-and-train (learning).
